prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with majestic wings and vibrant feathers.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that has a powerful beak and colorful plumage.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a large bird, showcasing a blend of yellow and brown.
Make a Pokemon that can soar through the skies with ease and elegance.
Imagine a creature that embodies freedom, with bright colors and fierce wings.
Design a majestic flying Pokemon with a striking hairstyle and keen eyesight.
Give me a Pokemon that gracefully glides above forests and mountains.

distinctive_features: Large wings with a distinctive shape
